overview: Dutch comedy icon Toon Hermans' second One Man Show was the first to be broadcast live on tv. The show caused a nationwide scramble of tv-sets, with millions of people tuning in. Featuring songs like 'Méditerranée',  'Ballonnetje' and the 'Kolderliedjes,' the show is seen as a landmark of Dutch television history.
tagline: Toons first full performance seen on tv
title: Toon Hermans: One Man Show 1958
